name: Sky Scraper
description:
Seems like the creators of Geometry Dash gave up on making the next version, so I took matters into my own hands.

Sky Scraper is just like Geometry Dash, just a lot more user friendly. There are no ads, and the full version of the game will come with a Level Editor that anyone can use at any time, which will allow you to share your levels with everyone, as well as play levels that other players have created. 

The main goal of the game is to maneuver through levels of spikes, blockades, portals, tricks, and so much more. There are cosmetics along the way that you could collect as well, but collecting the cosmetics requires you to step outside of your comfort zone.. You'll see what I mean.

You can unlock skins, and collect level cosmetics as you complete the rhythm based levels. The development full version of the game has already started and has an estimated release date (Late 2022), and it will also be free.

You should also consider joining the community:
